treatment.reference: Methanobacterium movens sp. nov. and Methanobacterium flexile sp. nov., isolated from lake sediment IJSEM 61:2974-2978
treatment.description: Cells are rods (0.3–0.5 µm wide x 2–5 µm long). Utilizes both H2/CO2 and formate for methane production. Chains of cells are formed in formate or under high pressure H2/CO2 (80 : 20, v/v; 100–250 kPa), and single cells are formed under lower pressure H2 (H2/CO2/N2; 40 : 10 : 50, v/v; 100–150 kPa). Acetate, methanol, ethanol, trimethylamine, isobutanol and 2-propanol are not used. Grows optimally at 35–38 ˚C and pH 7.0–7.5. Yeast extract is indispensable for growth. The DNA G+C content of the type strain is 36.4 mol% (Tm) and 37.3 mol% (HPLC). The type strain is GHT (=AS 1.5092T=JCM 15416T), isolated from the sediment of Gahai lake, China.
